alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 06 at 1:40PM EDT until August 06 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Anderson County in central Kentucky... West Central Woodford County in central Kentucky... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 140 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lawrenceburg, Mcbrayer, Birdie, Tyrone, Anderson City and Gee. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
